attributes.action: call for the cancellation of the London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The residents of London pay far too much council tax already and do not wish to subsidise the cost of these Olympics. We also suffer too much traffic congestion and pollution and do not wish to see even more of the London area under concrete.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call for the cancellation of the London Olympics."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14133.asp

Prime Minister's Office
